titles.title: What Will You Do With Jesus (?)

properties.verseOrder: v1 c1 v2 c1 v3 c1 v4 c1 v5 c1

verse.name: c1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}What will you do with Jesus Neutral you cannot be Someday your heart will be asking What will He do with me{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Jesus is standing in Pilate's hall Friendless forsaken betrayed by all Harken what meaneth the sudden call What will you do with Jesus{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Jesus is standing on trial still You can be false to Him if you will You can be faithful through good or ill What will you do with Jesus{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Will you evade Him as Pilate tried Or will you choose Him whate'er betide Vainly you struggle from Him to hide What will you do with Jesus{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Will you like Peter your Lord deny Or will you scorn from His foes to fly Daring for Jesus to live or die What will you do with Jesus{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Jesus I give Thee my heart today Jesus I'll follow Thee all the way Gladly obeying Thee will you say This will I do with Jesus{/lang-eng}
